Detailed Description

CmdLightKitModified class is the light definition command stored in the command stack.

CmdLightKitModified represents a modification of the scene light. The modification could be a new light definition, a modificaiton of the light position on the scene or change on the sun shape parameters value.

See also:
CmdLightPositionModified

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CmdLightKitModified::CmdLightKitModified ( TLightKit *  newLightKit,
SoSceneKit *  scene,
SceneModel &  sceneModel,
QUndoCommand *  parent = 0 
)

Creates a new lightKit modification command that represents a new light defined as newLightKit to the scene.

If the model has not previous light a light node is added to sceneModel.

References m_pNewLightKit, m_pPreviousLightKit, and m_scene.

Destroys the CmdLightKitModified object.

References m_pNewLightKit.

Member Function Documentation

void CmdLightKitModified::redo (  )  [virtual]

Applies a change to the light. After redo() scene will contain the light with the new definition.

See also:
undo().

References TLightKit::azimuth, TLightKit::ChangePosition(), TLightKit::distance, SceneModel::InsertLightNode(), m_pModel, m_pNewLightKit, m_pPreviousLightKit, m_scene, and TLightKit::zenith.

void CmdLightKitModified::undo (  )  [virtual]

Reverts to the previous light. After undo() is called, the state of the scene will be the same as before redo() was called. *

See also:
redo().

References TLightKit::azimuth, TLightKit::ChangePosition(), TLightKit::distance, m_pModel, m_pNewLightKit, m_pPreviousLightKit, m_scene, SceneModel::RemoveLightNode(), and TLightKit::zenith.
